body.name: Kussla Dash Cam Front and Rear, WiFi Dash Camera for Cars with 64G Card, 2.5K Dash Cam Front+1080P Rear Car Camera W/Super Night Vision, Dual Dashcam W/G-Sensor, Loop Recording, G-Sensor
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 1 hr 26 mins
features: 【Dash Cam Front and Rear Camera 2.5K+1080P】Elevate your driving experience with our advanced dual dash cam. Boasting a QHD resolution 2.5K front dash cam and 1080P rear dash cam, it captures crystal-clear details. The expansive 170° front and 140° rear angles minimize blind spots, providing crucial evidence in case of an incident.

【Front and Rear Dash Camera Built-in WiFi & App Control】This dashcams for cars comes with WiFi function. Connect your iOS or Android devices to our dash camera via WiFi. Use the 'viidure' app for real-time viewing, playback, and video downloads. Note: Remote connection isn't supported, and ensure a phone distance within 3-5m to avoid disconnection.

【Car Camera - Dash Cam Front and Rear with Loop Recording】The dash cameras for cars has a loop recording feature so that when the SD card is full, the latest recorded video will overwrite the oldest (except for locked files), eliminating the need for frequent manual deletion of footage. Once the G-sensor detects a sudden collision, it locks and saves the collision video.

【Wifi Dashcams for Cars Front and Rear with Super Night Vision 】This car dash camera Equipped with a front GC CMOS sensor, f/1.8 aperture, and WDR technology deliver super night vision. Whether it's low light or pitch-dark conditions, our 2.5k dash cam captures crucial details, ensuring optimal clarity during your entire journey.

【Dash Camera With Gravity Sensor & Parking Monitoring】 The car dash cam has a built-in G-sensor, which will automatically lock the current video when a sudden collision or impact is detected during recording. The dashcam has a built-in lithium battery (for accident recording only), it will switch on and record a short video of about 30 seconds when it detects a sudden collision while parked. For 24-hour parking monitoring, a dash cam hard kit is available separately.

【Dash Cam with 64GB Card】2.5K dash camera for cars front and rear adopts Type-C Charing Port, The car charger comes with a usb port, which does not delay power supply to other devices. The 3-inch super large IPS display screen, wireless dash cam support up to 128GB card, 64GB card is included. Also, the dual dash cam front and rearis easily been mounted to your car’s windshield with the included with 2 Suction Cup. Plug It and Start go.

【Reliable After-sales Service】Kussla dash cam comes with an 1 Years warranty and Lifetime-Tech-Support & 1 month worry-less return & 24/7 online after-sale customer care. If you have any questions or accessories are missed, please let us know, , and a 100% satisfaction guarantee for this car cam.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Kussla The Newest Dual Dash Cam Front and Rear with 64GB SD Card, Build in Wifi, App Control

Enhanced Dual Lens and F1.8 Large Aperture Our front rear dash cam is equipped with a wide F1.8 aperture, allowing it to capture high-definition video, even in low-light conditions. The cabin lens features six infrared lights for exceptional performance in various lighting situations. Seamless Loop Recording Our Car Camera supports seamless loop recording, which automatically overwrites the oldest video files when the micro SD card is full. No more manual deletion of unimportant videos. Rest assured, locked videos won't be overwritten and can be manually selected for deletion. You can also customize loop recording to capture video in 1, 3, or 5-minute segments, providing flexibility to suit your needs. Emergency Recording with G-Sensor Safety is a top priority with our car dash cam. It comes equipped with an adjustable G-Sensor that detects sudden shakes or collisions. When triggered, the current footage is locked and protected on the SD card, providing you with vital evidence in case of unexpected incidents on the road.

Elevate Your Vision with High Dynamic Range Our dual dash cam is equipped with High Dynamic Range (HDR) technology, ensuring exceptional detail balance in both low-light and high-light conditions. This technology delivers high-quality images and restores the true colors of objects to their fullest extent. Front 2.5K and Rear 1080P HD Resolution The front camera delivers an impressive 2.5K resolution at 1440P, complemented by the rear camera capturing at 1080P. The Kussla car camera employs a 170° front camera and a 140° rear camera, enabling simultaneous recording of both front and rear views. This dual-camera setup proves invaluable during unexpected events such as collisions, as it aids in retaining and presenting crucial evidence. Superior Night Vision Our dashcams for cars is equipped with a cutting-edge Sony sensor and a unique High Dynamic Range video system that ensures the best possible nighttime capture. Never miss a detail, even in low-light conditions.

2 Mounting Ways We offer two high-quality dash cam mounts to ensure your dash cam stays securely in place while you drive, a suction cup and 3M bracket. No matter which mount you choose, we offer you durable, stable, and reliable solutions .

What‘s in the box? 1×2.5k front dash cam, 1× 1080p rear dashcam1× 64G SD Card(already inserted into dash cam sd card slot)1×USB SD Card Reader1× Type-C Car Charger1× USB Cable1×Dash Cam User Manual1× Clean tool , 1 x Pin2× Rear Cam Installation Tool2× Suction Cup Mount

Build in Wifi & Free App Control Please Note： 1.A 64GB memory card is already inserted into dash cam sd card slot. and this dashcams max support 128 GB micro SD card. Please format the SD Card on computer or on car camera first before recording. ✘ Please DON'T USE "Generic Class 10" Cards from third-party sellers. The write and read speeds of these cards are not suitable for use with this dashboard. 2. Our car camera is equipped with a small battery designed for accident recording during parking. It automatically shuts down after 3-8 minutes of inactivity if there is no external power connection. Please note that external power is required for continuous operation while driving.

2.5K Dash Cam Front and Rear Dash Cam Front and Rear Inside 4K Dash Cam Front 1080P Dash Cam Front Dash Cam Front and Rear Model A30Pro 2.5K Dual Dash Cam X30 3 Channel Dash Cam A30L 4K Dash Cam A30 Dash Cam A30 Dual Dash Cam Camera Type Front + Rear Front + Rear + Inside Front Front Front + Rear Video Resolution 2.5K FHD 1080P+720P+720P@30fps 4K FHD 1080P@30fps FHD 1080P+720P@30fps SD Card 64GB 64GB 64GB 32GB 32GB Wide Angle 170°+140° 170°+150°+140° 170° 170° 170°+140° Screen Size 3 inch LCD 2 inch LCD 3 inch LCD 3 inch LCD 3 inch LCD

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It records your travels in impressively high quality videos.
reviews.reviewText: To look at, you wouldn't think this dash cam was able to produce the fine images and videos it does, - I am really impressed with the end results.The 170º wide-angle videos are crystal clear with good color balance. Being such a wide angle, I was surprised there wasn't more edge distortion.I installed the front camera on the passenger side of the windshield. Must change that to a more central location as the lens captures too much of the right window trim. It would be better placed beside or directly under the rear-view mirror.Getting the power cable from the power supply to the camera was fairly easy, but getting the cable to the rear camera was more difficult.I had plenty of cable length to play with, but hiding it was not easy.I had my rear camera installed on the rear window using a spare suction cup.This idea didn't last long as the rear defogger grid prevented a long-lasting suction seal. Changed that to the supplied adhesive pad.The manual describes how to install the rear camera by the rear license plate.... This was confusing to me as there was no specs on the camera to say it was weather proof. Plus it indicated I had to drill a hole through the car's body?!... And why would I have to connect the red cable to the car's reversing light?The instructions were pretty skimpy in this regard.The set up buttons on the main camera were easy to understand and operate. My preferred method to set up the camera is through the Viidure app using a wifi connection – which works well.For now I am not using the parking monitor or motion detection features. But I suppose I could without ordering their additional hardware kit, as my 'cigarette lighter' power supply does not shut down when the ignition is turned off.As mentioned, the quality of videos and jpegs that are saved to the SD card are exceptional.However, the video's format, .ts (MPEG-2 Transport Stream) will not play directly on my Mac without additional software.. I use VLC Media player. Also if I want to edit a saved video, my Mac's video editing app does not recognize the file format either.Recording time varies depending on video quality chosen, but you should get at least 6 or 7 hours of recording time (using both cameras) before old files are over-written by new.That's using the supplied 64GIG sd card. Upgrading to a 128GIG card will double the recording time.All things considered , this complete dash-cam set is a good deal.It comes with everything you need to continuously record your travels, both front and rear, in high-quality videos. It's versatile features are easy to operate and is unobtrusive .Even with my file format issues, I would definitely recommend this dash-cam set from KUSSLA.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent quality picture and audio; bit of an involved process to install
reviews.reviewText: This dash-cam was meant to be a replacement for my SUV. Overall it was fairly simple to install, and really doesn't require the rear camera to be installed for it function well. The iPhone application for use with the camera, actually had step by step instructions for adding a new camera to your profile, and unlike other cameras like Nexar, did not require me to create an account or have an email address. My only problem with the camera is the connectivity of the wifi. When those "egg-heads" Kussla co-opted the app, I don't think they added provisions for background usage. Basically once you connect to the camera's network, using your iPhone cellular data services is next to impossible, and almost always produces an on-screen prompt to either continue with wifi or use cellular data. In other words, your iPhone will think the dashcam is actually some kind of modem or wireless gateway, that has no connectivity to the web

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good picture quality. Only records 5-10min if power lost. Parking mode is cumbersome without app.
reviews.reviewText: Pros:The picture quality is a bit better than bargain cameras. License plates still need to be within 10-15ft to read. (The box it came in says 1080, but the camera has a 2.5k setting and the video is indeed 2.5k)When you put the car in reverse it automatically switches to the rear camera with parking guidelines.Included 64GB card is a real 64GB card (60GB usable).Multiple mounting options included.Cons:Buttons on sides require you to remember where the different buttons are and what their function is.Parking mode requires installation of a hard wired kit per instructions, but all it needs is constant power. If your power outlet stays on when the car is off it will work. All parking mode does is continue loop recording and lock the video segment (so it isn't overwritten) if an impact is detected.Parking mode must be manually turned on and must be manually turned off before returning to normal driving mode, otherwise video from driving will be locked and fill the card with locked videos.Battery is only large enough to power the camera for 5-10 minutes. If your car battery is damaged in an accident, the camera will only run another 5-10 minutes after it lost power.Overall the picture quality is better than the cheapest dashcams, but the small battery and poor onboard interface make it hard to use its full potential. Perhaps the wifi interface is more intuitive, but I did not want to install an app or follow a QR code. If you need a backup camera and good quality front video to record in a loop and aren't worried about parking mode, this camera might work for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Great DashCam For The Money
reviews.reviewText: I received it well packaged and it contained all of the parts needed. Installation was pretty simple, just stick the camera mount to the window, attached the camera, plug in the 12 volt cord and finally (the hardest part) mount the the backup camera and run the cord all the way to the windshield. I installed the backup camera on the weekend (the front facing camera can work just fine without it). Operation is pretty simple: when you plug it in it starts recording, when you start the car it starts recording, when you turn off the ignition it stops recording after a few minutes. The only thing I didn't like about the camera is that in order for the camera to record if someone bumps your car you have to buy a different wiring harness "sold separately." The problem is that I couldn't find the wiring harness so it's only going to record when you're driving. For me that's not a deal-breaker but I'd rather pay an extra dollar or 2 and get everything I need instead something that is questionably available for an additional fee. It is a nice camera otherwise, the video is easy to download and it appears to be durable and well made.
